p: A vast number of promising anti-viral treatments are currently under investigation to aid in the development of COVID-19 drug delivery. The current review focuses on the possible particulate delivery approaches and the research agenda to combat COVID-19. The current state of knowledge, research priorities regarding the pandemic and post COVID-19has been discussed. We also summarized the prospective treatments integrating the ever-expanding field of particulate delivery systems that have proven to be successful against other viruses, with the objective of showing that these can potentially be developed for COVID-19 treatment.
